info.name: TTelGo Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for TTelGo eSIM Platform Backend

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Request OTP for authentication. Purpose can be: LOGIN, REGISTER, RESET_PASSWORD, VERIFY_EMAIL, VERIFY_PHONE
Verify OTP and get JWT token
Register new user (sends registration OTP)
Refresh JWT access token using refresh token
Logout user and invalidate token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for OTP-based login and registration

request.description: Get user details by user ID
Get user details by email address
Update user profile information

item.name: Plans

request.description: Get all available eSIM bundles from eSIMGo API

query.description: Country ISO code (e.g., GB, US, AD)

request.description: Get bundles for a specific country by ISO code
Get detailed information about a specific bundle
Get local eSIM bundles (single country plans)
Get regional eSIM bundles (multiple countries in a region)
Get global eSIM bundles (many countries globally)

item.description: eSIM plan and bundle management endpoints

request.description: Activate an eSIM bundle (creates order and provisions eSIM)
Get QR code for eSIM activation by matching ID
Get eSIM order details by order ID
Get order details by order ID
Get order details by order reference number
Get all orders for a specific user
Get all published blog posts with optional filtering
Get blog post by slug

query.description: Number of featured posts to return

request.description: Get featured blog posts
Search blog posts
Get all blog posts including unpublished (admin only)
Get blog post by ID (admin only)

body.raw:
{
  "slug": "example-blog-post",
  "title": "Example Blog Post",
  "excerpt": "This is a short excerpt",
  "content": "Full blog post content here...",
  "featuredImage": "/IMAGES/Cities/Rome.jpg",
  "category": "Travel Tips",
  "readTime": "7 min read",
  "isFeatured": false,
  "isPublished": true,
  "authorName": "TTelGo Team",
  "metaTitle": "Example Blog Post",
  "metaDescription": "Meta description for SEO",
  "tags": "travel, esim, guide"
}

Get all active FAQs, optionally filtered by category
Get all distinct FAQ categories
Get all FAQs including inactive (admin only)
Get FAQ by ID (admin only)
